docs.snippet: In the struggle with the West for influence and control in Southeast Asia, the Communists enjoy certain decided advantages. The area lies tucked beneath the great land mass of Communist China. Communist control of North Vietnam provides a staging...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the struggle with the West for influence and control in Southeast Asia, the Communists enjoy certain decided advantages. The area lies tucked beneath the great land mass of Communist China. Communist control of North Vietnam provides a staging area for infiltration of South Vietnam, of Laos and from there of Cambodia and Thailand.

docs.snippet: JERUSALEM (Israeli Sector), Wednesday, May 10 -- A former Argentine Ambassador to Israel, Dr. Gregorio Topolevsky, said that he had no knowledge from official sources about the whereabouts of Martin Bormann, Hitler's deputy.
docs.lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM (Israeli Sector), Wednesday, May 10 -- A former Argentine Ambassador to Israel, Dr. Gregorio Topolevsky, said that he had no knowledge from official sources about the whereabouts of Martin Bormann, Hitler's deputy.
docs.abstract: Argentine ex-Amb Topolevsky denies knowledge of whereabouts
